itineraries.title: FROM RIO TO THE GREEN COAST: BEACHES, MOUNTAINS AND TROPICAL NATURE

visits.text: Corcovado and Christ the Redeemer statue with panoramic view of the bay
Lage Park and walk along its tropical trails

activities.text: Caipirinha tasting on Copacabana beach
Sunset walk on Ipanema beach

visits.text: Sugarloaf and cable car to the summit
Selarón Steps and artistic district of Santa Teresa

activities.text: Football match or visit to Maracanã stadium
Discovery of Eduardo Kobra's mural fresco

visits.text: Scenic route to Teresopolis through the tropical forest
Walk in Serra dos Órgãos national park (weather permitting)
Cathedral of São Pedro de Alcântara
Imperial Palace of Dom Pedro II
Stroll in front of the Crystal Palace and colonial houses

activities.text: Walk in the historic center and tasting of local pastries

visits.text: Discovery of Paraty's UNESCO-listed colonial center
Walk to the port and seaside promenade

activities.text: Dinner in a typical restaurant in Paraty

visits.text: Hike to the natural pool of Cachadaço in Trindade
Discovery of the natural slide of Penha

activities.text: Swimming in the natural pools and relaxing on the beach

visits.text: Journey Paraty – Angra dos Reis – Ilha Grande
Check-in at Araçatiba and discovery of the beach

activities.text: Sunset from the private dock
Evening by the water with Brazilian music

visits.text: Hike from Praia de Proveta to Praia de Aventureiro
Relaxing on Aventureiro beach and photo of the iconic palm tree

activities.text: Return by boat and swimming in the bay
Kite-surfing session on Fortim beach
Walk along the lagoon at low tide

visits.text: Crossing the Jaguaribe river by ferry with the 4x4
Route along the beaches, cliffs and salt flats to Galinhos

activities.text: Discovery of the village of Galinhos and its sandy streets
Observation of salt flats and mangroves on the route

visits.text: Boat excursion to the Galinhos dune
Swimming break and fresh seafood tasting on the beach

activities.text: Walk in the village and meeting with local fishermen
Sunset observation over the lagoon

visits.text: Route to São Miguel de Gostoso along the beaches

activities.text: Swimming and relaxation on São Miguel de Gostoso beach
Sunset walk on the beach

visits.text: Route to Pipa via Natal
Arrival and discovery of Pipa beach

activities.text: Cliff observation and swimming on Pipa beach
Walk in the lively village center

visits.text: Avenida Paulista (quick scouting at end of day)
Historic center of Paraty (colonial houses, churches)
Port and marina of Paraty (pier, view of the bay)
Praia do Pontal (walk, sunrise/end of day)
Morro do Forte (fort and belvedere)
Praia do Jabaquara (walk/beach)
Bay of Paraty (islets and mangrove by kayak)
Praia do Rosa (stop at isolated beach)
Mangrove of Paraty (passage by kayak)
Praia do Estreito (emerald bay)
Ilha Comprida (snorkeling)
Lagoa Azul (clear waters facing Ilha do Algodão)
Ilha do Algodão (lunch break and discovery)

activities.text: Walk along the Rio Perequê-Açu to the Matriz bridge
Stroll through art galleries and cobblestone streets
Free time in the historic center at the end of the day
Private boat excursion in the bay (local captain)
Dolphin watching (if present)
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Transfer Cristalino → Alta Floresta → (flight) Rio de Janeiro
Parque Lage (palace, gardens, grotto, pool)
Hiking Parque Lage → Corcovado (≈4 km, +700 m)
Christ the Redeemer (summit platform)
Mirante Dona Marta (view of Christ and bay)
Copacabana Beach (swimming, sunset)
Bike ride: Leme → Copacabana → Ipanema → Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas
Copacabana Palace (iconic facade)
Pedra do Arpoador (sunset spot)
Mirante do Leblon (view of Dois Irmãos and Vidigal)
Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas (piers, views)
Sugarloaf Mountain (Morro da Urca + summit, cable cars)
Beach morning at Copacabana (facing Leme)
Santa Teresa neighborhood (bohemian alleys, street art)
Escadaria Selarón (mosaics)
Vidigal favela (moto-taxi ride up, viewpoints)
Ipanema beach (sunset, Arpoador)
Vila Isabel samba school (rehearsal)
Forte do Leme (short urban forest trail, panorama)

activities.text: Carioca evening (Mureta da Urca, Boulevard Olímpico, Lapa)
Sunset at Sugarloaf (summit platform)
Dois Irmãos hike (option, if weather ok ~1 h ascent)
Free time and departure (airport transfer)

visits.text: Journey Paraty → (road) São Paulo GRU → (flight) Cuiabá → (road) Chapada dos Guimarães
Sunrise viewpoint (observation tour near the pousada)
Cidade de Pedra (cliffs and savanna, hiking ~2 km)
River (swimming spot and light snorkeling)
Cachoeira Véu da Noiva (iconic waterfall, viewpoint)
Alto do Céu (sunset viewpoint)

activities.text: Check-in at Pousada do Parque (in the heart of the park)
Guided 4×4 day in the national park
Bird watching (macaws, vultures...)

visits.text: Aquário Encantado (snorkeling in turquoise water)
River descent (approx. 700 m, mask/snorkel)
Cachoeira Serra Azul (hike, swimming under waterfall)
Lagoa das Araras (sunset, macaw observation)

activities.text: Serra Azul zipline (~700 m) optional

visits.text: Transfer to Alta Floresta then boat (20 min) to Cristalino Lodge
Boat scouting trip (wildlife, sunset)
Tapiri Trail (jungle hike, viewpoints, 3–4 h)
Wildlife observation (caimans, capybaras, tapirs, birds) by boat
Confluence spot with different colored waters (sunset)
Observation tower (sunrise, tower ~50 m)
Castanheira Trail (Brazil nut forest, 3–4 h)
River beach for drinks/sunset

activities.text: Briefing at the lodge (organization of included activities)
Night trip on the river (lamp observation, caimans)
Free time at the floating dock (swimming possible)
Kayak trip on the Cristalino River (outbound), return by boat

itineraries.title: FROM CORCOVADO TO THE BEACHES OF JERICOACOARA

visits.text: Ascent to Corcovado and visit to Christ the Redeemer offering a panoramic view over Rio
Discovery of Sugarloaf Mountain and panorama over Guanabara Bay

activities.text: Stroll on the beaches of Copacabana and Ipanema

visits.text: Exploration of the Selarón Steps connecting Lapa to Santa Teresa
Visit to the Saint Sebastian Cathedral of Rio, modernist masterpiece
Walk at the Sambadrome, major venue of Rio Carnival

activities.text: Stroll through the Feira Hippie market in Ipanema to discover local crafts
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Flight Rio → Foz do Iguaçu (≈4h journey with stopover)
Discovery of Iguaçu National Park on the Brazilian side and view of the falls

activities.text: Observation of local wildlife: coatis, tropical birds and butterflies
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Crossing to Iguazú National Park on the Argentine side to admire the Garganta del Diablo
Walk on the walkways of the upper and lower circuit

activities.text: Optional cruise at the foot of Iguazu Falls

visits.text: Flight Foz do Iguaçu → Fortaleza then transfer to Jericoacoara (≈5h by road)

activities.text: Discovery of Jericoacoara village and its sandy streets
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Buggy excursion through the dunes and freshwater lagoons of Jericoacoara
Discovery of Pedra Furada, emblematic rock arch

activities.text: Swimming and relaxation in the turquoise lagoons of Jijoca

visits.text: Walk in the dunes at sunset on Duna do Pôr do Sol

activities.text: Festive evening in the village center to the rhythm of Brazilian music

visits.text: Flight Fortaleza → Recife then bus transfer to Porto de Galinhas (≈1h30)

activities.text: Walk on the coconut palm-lined beaches and first immersion in the village
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Morning boat trip to observe natural pools and swim among fish
Buggy excursion to the beaches of Maracaípe, Camboa and Cupe
Visit to the Hippocampus center, dedicated to seahorse preservation

activities.text: Relaxation and swimming on the main beach of Porto de Galinhas

visits.text: Return to Recife, quick visit of the historic center and Boa Viagem district

itineraries.title: BRAZIL XXL: FROM SÃO PAULO TO IGUAÇU FALLS, TROPICAL NORTHEAST AND RETURN VIA RIO

visits.text: São Paulo Museum of Art (MASP) and Avenida Paulista
Ibirapuera Park: Oscar Niemeyer pavilions
Historic Center: Pátio do Colégio, Catedral da Sé

activities.text: Urban street-food walk in Liberdade
Sunset at the Edifício Copan viewpoint

visits.text: Curitiba Botanical Garden (Art Nouveau greenhouse)
Oscar Niemeyer Museum (MON)
Historic center: Largo da Ordem

activities.text: Tanguá Park: panoramic walk

visits.text: Florianópolis Center and Mercado Público
Lagoa da Conceição and dunes
Praia Joaquina or Campeche (your choice)

activities.text: Short hike to Lagoinha do Leste (partial round trip if time permits)
Seafood tasting on the waterfront

visits.text: Mountain route SC→PR (rural views and valleys)
Pato Branco Center: Praça Presidente Vargas

activities.text: Urban stroll and neighborhood cafés

visits.text: Iguaçu National Park (Brazilian side): walkways and Devil's Throat
Bird Center (Parque das Aves)

activities.text: Macuco Safari boat option (baptism of the falls)
Sunset viewpoint

visits.text: Itaipu Binacional (dam viewpoint, morning)
Stop in Cascavel: Praça do Migrante

activities.text: Route PR→MS through the countryside (photo stops)

visits.text: Indigenous Nations Park
Campo Grande Municipal Market (Mercadão)

activities.text: Southern Pantanal detour (viewpoints/interpretation centers if open)

visits.text: Cuiabá center: Praça Alencastro and cathedral
Pantanal Natural History Museum (if time permits)

activities.text: Chapada dos Guimarães (short trek to Véu de Noiva—if arriving early)

visits.text: Cristo Rei do Araguaia Viewpoint
Rio Araguaia river beaches (seasonal)

activities.text: Swimming/relaxing on the banks (depending on conditions)

visits.text: Ministries Esplanade and Praça dos Três Poderes
Metropolitan Cathedral of Brasília (Niemeyer)
National Congress (exteriors)

activities.text: UNESCO architecture circuit (Brazilian modernism)

visits.text: Planaltina/Chapada dos Veadeiros (panorama stop if detour made the day before)
Historic center of Barreiras (Praça Castro Alves)

activities.text: Rio Grande walk (docks/riverbanks)

visits.text: Bom Jesus center: Praça Marcos Aurélio
Senhor do Bonfim Church

activities.text: BA→PI route through the Cerrado (photo stops)

visits.text: Ponte Estaiada Complex (urban view)
City Park / Potycabana Park

activities.text: Teresina artisan market

visits.text: Historic center of Parnaíba
Porto das Barcas

activities.text: Boat excursion in the Delta do Parnaíba (mangroves)

visits.text: Iracema Beach and English Bridge
Dragão do Mar Center (culture)

activities.text: Swimming/relaxing Praia do Futuro

visits.text: Forte dos Reis Magos
Historic center of Natal

activities.text: Buggy on the dunes of Genipabu (local classic)

visits.text: Recife Antigo: Praça do Marco Zero
Boa Viagem (seafront)

activities.text: Olinda option (UNESCO) at the end of the day: viewpoints

visits.text: Orla de Atalaia (promenade)
Mercado Municipal Antônio Franco

activities.text: Seaside walk at sunset

visits.text: Pelourinho (UNESCO): Largo do Pelourinho, baroque churches
Elevador Lacerda & Mercado Modelo (Baía de Todos os Santos)

activities.text: Afro-Bahian music in the evening (historic district)
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Historic Center of Porto Seguro and colonial churches
Arraial d'Ajuda / Praia do Espelho (depending on timing)

activities.text: Swimming and relaxation on the beaches of southern Bahia coast
Vol prochaine étape

visits.text: Historic center of Ouro Preto (UNESCO): Praça Tiradentes
Baroque churches: São Francisco de Assis / Nossa Senhora do Pilar

activities.text: Mining Museums (short guided tour)

visits.text: Christ the Redeemer (Corcovado)
Sugarloaf Mountain (Urca cable car)
Copacabana / Ipanema (walk)

activities.text: Road return to São Paulo (planning / late departure or D+1)

itineraries.title: BRAZILIAN NORTHEAST: LENÇÓIS, DELTA DO PARNAÍBA, SERRA DA IBIAPABA AND SECRET BEACHES (14 DAYS)

visits.text: Historic center of São Luís: azulejos, colonial alleys and colorful facades (UNESCO).

activities.text: Sunset walk on the Praia Grande esplanade and Centro viewpoints.

visits.text: Boat trip down the Rio Preguiças with stops at Vassouras (pequenos Lençóis), Mandacaru (lighthouse) and Caburé.

activities.text: Climb up Mandacaru lighthouse for the view over the delta and ocean.

visits.text: Lençóis Maranhenses National Park: 4×4 and walk on the dunes, swimming in the lagoons.
Canto do Atins: lagoons and sandy points at tide.

activities.text: Sunset observation on the dunes.

visits.text: Caburé beach between river and ocean, then road/lancha to Tutóia.
Navigation in the Delta do Parnaíba: islets, mangroves and dunes.

activities.text: Observation of scarlet ibises at the end of the day.

visits.text: Discovery of the village of Curimãs: fishing boats, dunes and coastal life.

activities.text: Walk along the beach and coves between dunes and mangrove.

visits.text: Relaxation day: beaches of Curimãs and observation of nets and jangadas.

activities.text: Swimming and twilight stroll on the beach.

visits.text: Route to Serra da Ibiapaba: viewpoints and plateau forests.
Ubajara center and surroundings, gateway to the national park.

activities.text: Short acclimatization walk on the park trails.

visits.text: Ubajara National Park: cable car/Ubajara cave (if open) and Atlantic forest trails.
Viewpoints over canyons and waterfalls.

activities.text: Swimming in natural pool at the foot of a waterfall.

visits.text: Trek on the ridges of Serra Ibiapaba: Paredões and private reserves.
Historic center of Viçosa do Ceará: colonial architecture and rapadura/liqueur workshops.

activities.text: Sunset from a mirante on the serra.

visits.text: Descent to the coast: arrival at Moitas (Icaraí de Amontada), fishing village and mangroves.

activities.text: Walk on the beaches at low tide between sandbanks and mangroves.

visits.text: Buggy excursion on the coast: deserted beaches, isolated villages and large dunes.
Caetanos Lagoon: swimming break in the heart of the dunes.

activities.text: Tasting grilled fish or fresh coconut by the sea.

visits.text: Boat trip in the mangrove and discovery of the hinterland with red lands.

activities.text: Village immersion: exchange of know-how and tasting of local products.

visits.text: Kayak or paddle on the rio Aracatiaçu between mangroves and river mouth.

activities.text: Free afternoon on the beach and observation of jangadas.

visits.text: Journey to Fortaleza and final walk on the Beira Mar according to departure time.

activities.text: Last viewpoints over the Atlantic

itineraries.title: BRAZIL FLAVORS AND COLORS: FROM SÃO PAULO TO RIO VIA THE COSTA VERDE

visits.text: Walk in Ibirapuera Park and visit to the Afro Brasil Museum
Discovery of the Centro Histórico de São Paulo and the Municipal Market
Visit to the Museu de Arte de São Paulo (MASP) and walk on Avenida Paulista
Discovery of the hills of the Serra do Mar and downtown Cunha
Visit to ceramic workshops and meeting with local artisans
Hike to the waterfalls of Serra do Mar

activities.text: Tasting of farm products and visit to a shiitake farm

visits.text: Walk through the UNESCO-listed historic center of Paraty
Visit to Fazenda Bananal and discovery of local agroecology
Trek in the Mata Atlântica and swimming at waterfalls

activities.text: Boat excursion in Paraty bay and exploration of secret beaches

visits.text: Discovery of Lopes Mendes and Dois Rios beaches
Hike to Pico do Papagaio for a panoramic view

activities.text: Snorkeling around coves and relaxation in hammock

visits.text: Ascent to Corcovado and visit to Christ the Redeemer
Ascent of Sugar Loaf by cable car
Walk in the bohemian neighborhood of Santa Teresa
Exploration of Tijuca Forest

activities.text: Swimming and relaxation on the beaches of Ipanema and Copacabana
Samba evening and discovery of Afro-Brazilian culture
